resources.string: Mixin syncs your address book to Mixin servers to help you connect with other Mixin users
Add by Mixin ID or Phone number
Add people by Mixin ID or phone number

invites you to a voice call

Allow bot to access your asset list and balance.
Allow bot to access your bot list.
Allow bot to access your circle list.
Allow bot to access your contact list and blocked list.
Allow bot to access your NFT list and balance.
Allow bot to access your phone number.
Allow bot to access your public profile such as name, Mixin ID, avatar, etc.
Allow bot to access your transfer records, including deposits and withdrawals.
Allow bot to add or modify your bots.
Allow bot to add, modify and delete your circles.
Allow bot to send messages represent of you.
Allow dApp to access your wallet balance and activity.
Allow dApp to ask for your approval to make a transaction.

Change auto-download settings for medias. Voice messages are always automatically downloaded.
Choose a folder, backups will be saved to this location
Back up your messages to external storage. You can restore them when you reinstall Mixin. Messages you back up are not protected while in external storage.
Auto back up to external storage
Sign in to iCloud to back up your history. Settings > iCloud > Turn on iCloud Drive.
There are no available memory for backup.

Blocked users can't send you messages or add you to groups.
Long press and drag the bot to the top

Mixin ID %1$s is not on your contact list. Make sure the recipient you chosen is correct. If you transfer to the wrong person, your assets will be lost!

Successful purchase of %1$s. %2$s will be transferred directly to Mixin wallet.
Our team is working diligently to expand our reach, with the goal of supporting your region in the near future. Once we're ready to roll, we'll make sure to drop you a note.
No one outside of this call can view or listen to it. Not even Mixin.
This call is secured with end-to-end encryption
To make voice calls, Mixin needs access to your microphone. Please tap Setting to open system settings.
Call service unavailable. Make sure your phone has an internet connection and try again.

Let's chat on Mixin Messenger! Simple, safe, and easy to use. It also supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies, download https://mixin.one/messenger and search @%1$s to add me as a friend.
Messages you selected will be deleted for everyone on the latest version of Mixin in this chat.
You will not be able to restore later if you decline to restore now. Media files will continue restore in background after messages is restored.
Waiting for %1$s to get online and establish an encrypted session. %2$s.

This address supports all base on EOS tokens.
This address supports all ERC-20 tokens, such as ETH, XIN, etc.
This address supports all TRC-10 and TRC-20 tokens.

Your %1$s deposit address has been updated. The deposit address will automatically update with system or network upgrades. Old addresses are still valid for deposits, but it is not recommended for further use.

If you want to share a bot, add it to your contacts first
Use the built-in Camera to scan any QR Code. When a code is detected, tap the notification to view more information.

The chat history has been repaired successfully! Chat records before %1$s have been restored.
Send the conversation log to developers?
Another request is in process, please retry after current request is finished
Restore your chat history from iCloud.

Restoring chat history from iCloud will not overwrite the local records. It will only perform incremental synchronization. Please do not close the screen and keep Mixin running in the foreground while restoring.
There are already %1$d local chat records, and the last message was created at %1$s. Are you sure you want to overwrite the local data with the chat data on iCloud?
Restore your chat history from PC

Synchronize your chat history from the Mixin Messenger desktop client. The synchronization will not overwrite the local records but only incrementally synchronize them. Please make sure that both devices are connected to the same Wi-Fi or hotspot.
Restore your messages from external storage.\nIf you don't restore new, you won't be able to restore later.

Back up your messages and media to external storage. You can restore them when you reinstall Mixin. Your messages and media will also back up to your phone's internal storage. Media and messages your back up are not protected by Mixin end-to-end encryption while in external storage.
Not found, please copy the backup file into %1$s

The emergency contact is designed to help you log in to your account if you are lost and can not retrieve your mobile number.
When your lost your mobile number, please contact your emergency contact by phone or other means to get the Mixin ID and verification code. Read our Emergency Contact to **learn more**.
Your emergency contact is protected by PIN
Enter the 4-digit code sent to Mixin ID: %1$s

Do you want to stop syncing chat history?
You can free up storage by deleting items that are large or have been forwarded many times.

Your phone is low on storage, which can seriously affect your Mixin experience and may even result in corrupted or lost chats and other important data. So it's recommended to uninstall unused apps to clear up enough space
Your phone is low on storage
This sender is not in your contacts

The deposit for %1$s has been temporarily suspended. This action has been taken due to potential factors such as low utilization, node failure, blockchain network hard fork, or congestion. We kindly request your attention to the fact that the %2$s assets already stored in the wallet remain transferable.
Please keep the app in the foreground while verifying and synchronizing shard keys to the TIP network; do not force quit the app during the setup process.
Mixin syncs your address book to Mixin servers to help you connect with other Mixin users.
It's rare to see a third confirmation somewhere else, so please remember the PIN is unrecoverable if lost.
Set a 6 digit PIN to create your first digital wallet

Set a 6 digit Wallet PIN to create your first digital wallet, the PIN is based on the Throttled Identity Protocol, which is the decentralized key derivation protocol, read the document to **learn more**.
The 6-digit PIN is based on the Throttled Identity Protocol, which is the decentralized key derivation protocol, read the document to **learn more**.

Review the address, network, and amount meticulously. Any mistake may result in irretrievable asset loss.
The address %1$s(%2$s) has not been used for over %3$s days. Please check if the address is still valid.
The withdrawal request is being sent to the Mixin mainnet. Please wait a moment.
Withdrawal request successful. Please wait a moment.
Review the recipient, network, and amount. Any mistake may result in irretrievable asset loss.
The transfer request is being sent to the Mixin mainnet. Please wait a moment.
Transfer request successful. The recipient will promptly receive it.
What about %@? Once enabled, you can expedite authentication with %@.
What about biometric? Once enabled, you can expedite authentication with biometric.
Merchant payment is complete. You can opt to return to the merchant or stay in Mixin.
You transferred %1$s to the recipient %2$s ago.
The value of this transfer of %1$s is up to %2$s. Please ensure the amount is correct.
%1$s (%2$s) is not in your contacts. Please verify if the recipient is correct.
Review the address, Memo (tag), and network. Any mistake may result in irretrievable asset loss.
The request to revoke the multisig is currently under verification by the Mixin server. Please wait a moment.
Your signature has been revoked by the Mixin mainnet.
The request to add the address is currently under verification by the Mixin server. Please wait a moment.
Address has been added. You can immediately use this address for withdrawals.
The request to deleting the address is currently under verification by the Mixin server. Please wait a moment.
The request to edit the address is currently under verification by the Mixin server. Please wait a moment.
The Mixin server has confirmed your address editing request. You can immediately use this address for withdrawals.
Are you sure to delete this address?
Kindly confirm your ability to securely store the private key and your willingness to accept the potential risk of leakage.
Exporting the private key of your Mixin wallet, please wait.
Please write down the private key on a piece of paper and secure it within a safe or other secure location.
Do not take screenshots or share the key on the internet.

Mixin Messenger's MPC wallet is built on the decentralized key protocol TIP. The complete key of the wallet only exists in the TEE secure environment of current device, with no risk of leakage. Neither us nor any third party can access the private key. We strongly advise non-professionals not to export the private key. Read the documentation to learn more.
The private key enables transfer of all assets within current wallet, without the need for SMS or PIN code verification.
Mixin Messenger does not facilitate private key import. Use mainnet tools for operations if needed.
It is strongly discouraged to use the private key while the Mixin Messenger account is accessible, as the related assets may become unusable within Mixin Messenger.
Your %1$s account is based on your Mixin Messenger MPC wallet and derived according to the BIP44 protocol.
It is recommended to transfer assets back to more secured Mixin wallet as soon as interactions with dApps are completed.
Your assets in %1$s account and Mixin wallet are isolated but managed using the same PIN.
Asset transfers between your %1$s account and Mixin wallet incur network fees.
Unlocking your %1$s account will also automatically unlock EVM accounts such as %2$s, %3$s and others.
Allow the app to view your account address and ask for your approval to make a transaction.
We cannot verify this request; please ensure you trust this dApp before proceeding with the request.
Tap the send button to immediately broadcast the message or tap the discard button to discard the signed message.
This application can access all %3$s in your %1$s account (%2$s).
This dApp can withdraw all your %1$s.
Transaction decoding failed, making it impossible to estimate asset changes. Be cautious and only sign transactions for dApps you trust.
Please ensure you trust this dapp before proceeding with the request.
The message has been signed and sent successfully, please return to dApp to continue.
The transaction has been signed and sent successfully, please return to dApp to continue.
The data has been signed and sent successfully, please return to dApp to continue.
Use this address for receiving tokens on Ethereum, Polygon, BSC networks
You do not have enough %1$s in your account to pay for network fees
This signature request is issued by Mixin Messenger.
